articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Breeding Station of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Breeding Station of KPA
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of  Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the Breeding Station No. 621 of the KPA where its first phase construction was completed.
					 He personally initiated the construction of the station and chose its site in a good place, unraveling problems arising in the construction one by one.
					
					 He visited the construction site on May 20 and set the goal of the 1st phase to make sure that a comprehensive breeding center is built to specialize in breeding grass-eating domestic animals of good stock including goat.
					
					 Soldier-builders waged a high-pitched drive day and night, creating pasture covering hundreds of hectares and building many establishments and pens and folds in a vast area of more than 1500 hectares. As a result, the first phase construction was successfully wound up and the breeding of domestic animals of good stock started, bringing about a dramatic change in the remote mountain village.
					
					 After being briefed on the layout of the station and its long-term plan, he went round the breeding research center, management building, cultural hall, breeding pens and dwelling houses to learn about the construction in detail.
					
					 He praised the soldier-builders for successfully carrying out the order of the supreme commander to complete the first phase construction of the station by the anniversary of the WPK in a matter of a little over 4 months.
					
					 He was very pleased that a good prospect was opened for supplying more meat to service personnel thanks to the labor drive of the soldier-builders.
					
					 Domestic animals of good stock bred by the station are very high in economic effectiveness, he said, adding that the People's Army is taking the lead in carrying out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on obtaining meat from grass.
					
					 Noting that it is important to settle the matter of fodder in order to massively breed grass-eating domestic animals, he gave instructions to the station to exert a lot of efforts not only for effectively using existing pasture but creating new grass land and planting a lot of trees.
					
					 As the station performs the function and role as an advanced base in carrying out the WPK's policy which calls for considering supply service as a struggle for defending socialism, he instructed the station to work out bold and big operations for building the station and push ahead with the project under a carefully worked out plan on the basis of the successes and experience gained and thus turn this area into a modern breeding station.
					
					 He set the goal of the 2nd phase construction of the station and indicated orientation and ways for attaining it.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, KPA General Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Hwang Pyong So and Hong Yong Chil, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Daily Necessities Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Daily Necessities Factory
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the  Daily Necessities Factory managed by Kim Ik Chol and specified tasks and ways for modernizing the factory.
					 He first went round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions given by President Kim Il Sung, the monument to the field guidance provided by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He looked back with deep emotion on the course covered by the factory, recalling that Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk visited the factory several times including their visit on March 30, 1947 and gave instructions on increasing the production of quality daily necessities by improving business management.
					
					 Going round various workshops, cultural hall, etc., he learned in detail about production and technical specifications of equipment and workers' cultural and emotional life.
					
					 After learning in detail about the interior and exterior of the factory and varieties and quality of daily necessities, he praised the factory for doing a lot of work. He noted he visited the factory in order to make it a model of the daily necessities factories in the 21st century.
					
					 He said it is very important to mass-produce daily necessities for satisfactorily ensuring the people's creative life while producing ultra-modern machines in order to build the DPRK into an economic power and enable its people to lead a happy life with no more to desire in the world.
					
					 He instructed the factory to aim high in modernizing itself as required by the new century to make one feel refreshed when seeing and bring about a dramatic change in the appearances of not only all its production buildings but its cultural and welfare establishments  so that its present may stand in sharp contrast to its past. 
					
					 He showed such loving care as promising to personally solve all the issues arising in modernizing the factory including the matter of fully providing modern equipment necessary for its modernization.
					
					 He proposed the officials, greatly excited by his visit to the factory on the significant day when leader Kim Jong Il was elected general secretary of the WPK and his precious instructions, to call the factory "October 8 Factory" in the sense that they would work hard, always remembering the desire of Kim Jong Il who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Hong Yong Chil, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: U.S. Warned of Disastrous Consequences to Be Entailed by Nuclear Strike Means of Its Forces
articles.content:
U.S. Warned of Disastrous Consequences to Be Entailed by Nuclear Strike Means of Its Forces
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army released the following statement on Monday:
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is now getting strained again though the tension had been defused thanks to the patient efforts on the part of the DPRK.
					
					 This is entirely attributable to the persistent anti-DPRK military confrontation of the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 As already reported, the nuclear-powered carrier strike group of the navy of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces entered Pusan Port again at dawn of October 4. It participated in the DPRK-targeted joint naval maneuvers which had been under way secretly in the East Sea of Korea since September 30.
					
					 This strike group is made up of the U.S. super-large nuclear-powered carrier George Washington with at least 100 nuclear bombs aboard, many guided-missile destroyers, cruisers, submarines and escort warships, etc.
					
					 It is reported that the strike group will get involved in the DPRK-targeted large-scale joint naval strike maneuvers in the South Sea of Korea from Tuesday together with warship groups of the Japanese aggression forces and south Korean puppet navy.
					
					 Now the U.S. imperialists are openly advertising that the drills to be staged with the aircraft carrier task force as an axis are a planned military offensive to pressurize the DPRK in a bid to deter its possible "provocations" including nuclear test and missile launch and lead it to "changes" desired by them.
					
					 This clearly proves that the remarks of such high-ranking officials of the U.S. Obama administration as the secretary of State that the U.S. neither pursues a hostile policy towards the DPRK nor has the will to attack it are sheer lies.
					
					 The gravity of the situation is that all these military moves are timed to coincide with the adoption of the "tailored deterrence strategy" presupposing a preemptive strike at the DPRK between the master and its servant.
					
					 In this connection, the units of all services and army corps level of the KPA received an emergency order from its supreme command to reexamine the operation plans already ratified by it and keep themselves fully ready to promptly launch operations any time, watching with high vigilance every move of the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and the puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that the more frequently and the deeper its imperialist aggression forces' nuclear strike means including the nuclear carrier enter the air above the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula and waters off it, the more unpredictable disasters their actions will cause.
					
					 The U.S. will be wholly accountable for the unexpected horrible disaster to be met by its imperialist aggression forces' nuclear strike means as it is deploying them regardless of the time.
					
					 In this regard the DPRK invariably holds that if the U.S. administration stands for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and is interested in the peace and security in the region, the U.S., not the DPRK, should make a decision to move first.
					
					 Because it is none other than the U.S. which adopted an extremely hostile policy toward the DPRK, spawned the nuclear issue on the peninsula and has posed a constant nuclear threat to it.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that the Korean people and army are highly alerted to promptly and confidently cope and foil blatant provocations of any hostile forces in the world with its own powerful military muscle.

articles.title: Greetings to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to the joint efforts, wishing the president and people of Uganda greater success in their efforts for peace, development and prosperity.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Thai Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Thai Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun met and had a cordial talk with the delegation of the Thailand International Development Cooperation Agency headed by its Director General Piroon Laismit which paid a courtesy call on him Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Macedonian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Macedonian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Oliver Shambevski, Macedonian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps, Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps, Military Attaches Corps
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by doyen of the diplomatic corps Chhorn Hay, Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK, and Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, and to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by doyen of the military attaches corps Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from An Tong Su's Bereaved Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from An Tong Su's Bereaved Family
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Jong Il Sim, a widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the mission of the UNFAO here laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday before paying tribute to them on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Monument to Party Founding
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Monument to Party Founding
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the Monument to Party Founding on Tuesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The guests went round the tower, round pedestal and platform, being briefed on the fact that the monument was built as a symbol of the single-minded unity of service personnel and people rallied close around the party and the leader, and as an edifice of eternal value showing the proud history of struggle of the WPK which has recorded only victory and glory.
					
					 At the end of the visit the chief said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed great exploits for the building and strengthening of the revolutionary party of Juche.
					
					 The WPK which has always emerged victorious will give full play to the invincible might in the future, too, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man, he noted.

articles.title: DPRK, China Sign Plan of Cultural Exchange for New Year
articles.content:
DPRK, China Sign Plan of Cultural Exchange for New Year 
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- An execution plan of cultural exchange for new planned year was signed between the governments of the DPRK and China at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony were Hwang Ho Nam, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned from the DPRK side and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy members from the opposite side.
					
					 Hwang and Liu signed the plan.

articles.title: Icelandic President Wishes for Good Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Icelandic President Wishes for Good Friendly Relations with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Kwang Chol, DPRK ambassador to Iceland, presented his credentials to Olafur Ragnar Grimsson, president of the Republic of Iceland, on October 2.
					 At the meeting the president wished the DPRK successes in its efforts for improving the people's well-being and achieving the socio-economic development, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to grow on good terms.

articles.title: Story-telling "Voice of Mother" Held
articles.content:
Story-telling "Voice of Mother" Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Story-telling of youth and students "Voice of Mother" took place at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday to mark the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 68th anniversary of the WPK. 
					 Author Ju Kwang Il of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea recited lyric poem "Eruption from Heart" leaving deep impression. The poem recollected the passion and delight with which the people elected Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK. 
					
					 Nam Hye Yong, lecturer at the Monument to Party Founding Management Office, and other speakers referred to the noble traits of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and worked heart and soul for the country's prosperity by making high intensity forced march. 
					
					 An Phyong Ok, graduate from Kim Il Sung University, said that she was honored to receive the autograph of Marshal Kim Jong Un for the letter she sent reflecting her pride of coming first in the national students' quick reading contest and swimming race. She said that the loving care for posterity shown by Kim Jong Il is being carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Stories made by Ko Kum Song and Cha Hyo Sim from Kumya County touched the heartstrings of the participants as they talked about the benevolence of the mother party which has taken warm care of them and cured the bruise in their minds. 
					
					 They expressed their will to display bravery of youth and make exploits in the present general offensive for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, upholding Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK. 
					
					 Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the youth league Central Committee, officials of the youth league and youth and students here.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Tuesday to celebrate the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang included the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the April 25 House of Culture and the Arch of Triumph Square which were crowded with youth and students celebrating the significant October holiday.
					
					 The cheerful parties began with such songs as "The Party Is General's Embrace." 
					
					 The participants presented dances with the profound feelings of respect for Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into an invincible and iron-willed party and opened up a new history of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 They were full of pride of glorifying their youth in the struggle for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people as they danced to the tune of "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party" and other songs.
					
					 The atmosphere of the parties was heightened as songs like "A Thriving Nation Is in Sight", "At One Go" and "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front" reverberated far and wide, reflective of the spirit and optimism of the youths who are creating miracle and innovation always advancing straightforward toward the prosperous tomorrow.

articles.title: National Flower Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Flower Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A national flower exhibition opened with due ceremony at the April 15 Children's Flower Garden here Tuesday.
					 On display there are more than 32 000 potted flowers and flower shrubs of at least 300 species presented by ministries, national institutions and many units here and in each province.
					
					 On show are floral baskets, dwarf trees, miniature flower gardens, plant sculptures that exhibit various methods of decoration with the use of flowers and flower trees.
					
					 The presentation of scientific and technological findings will take place during the exhibition to widely disseminate the technology for cultivating flowers and flower trees of good species.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kang Yong Su, minister of Urban Management, other officials concerned as well as officials and workers in floricultural field and flower lovers throughout the country.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony they looked round the exhibition.
					
					The exhibition will last till Saturday.

articles.title: DPRK Scientists Praised as Heroes
articles.content:
DPRK Scientists Praised as Heroes
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- It was when respected Marshal Kim Jong Un visited a local factory together with leader Kim Jong Il in April Juche 100 (2011).
					 Kim Jong Un met a department head of Kim Chaek University of Technology on the way of walking round the factory.
					
					 After listening in detail to his research achievements in the factory, Kim Jong Un appreciated his efforts and kindly took his hands.
					
					 When having a photo session with Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un urged the department head to stand by him, praising him as a nation's treasure.
					
					 Boundless is Kim Jong Un's loving care for the scientists and technicians, who have played a big role in improving the people's livelihood and beefing up the defence capabilities.
					
					 He always stressed that the DPRK is strong and the revolutionary cause of the WPK is steadily making victorious progress as the country have such genuine patriots as the scientists and technicians of merit, highly praising them as the most admirable heroes.
					
					 Encouraged by his loving care, the local scientists now stand in the van in building an economic power.

articles.title: Autumn Sowing of Wheat and Barley Seeds Over
articles.content:
Autumn Sowing of Wheat and Barley Seeds Over
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The farms in South and North Hwanghae provinces have finished sowing of wheat and barley seeds for autumn.
					 Officials and farmers in the field of agriculture in the provinces conducted a dynamic drive to successfully wind up the sowing of wheat and barley seeds for autumn in the right season while stepping up harvesting.
					
					 They finished the sowing in a short period by setting up concrete plan and concentrating their efforts in Ongjin, Unryul and Unchon counties, true to the double-cropping policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The cooperative farms in Haeju City and the region of Yonbaek correctly fixed the right field for sowing and fully applied manure, carrying out daily plan as required by the Juche-based farming method.
					
					 The farmers in various counties including Sinchon, Jaeryong and Anak successfully sowed seeds and covered them with soil with conscious of being responsible for the granary of the country. 
					
					 Co-operative farms in Sariwon City registered good results by rationalizing the allotment of manpower.
					
					 Songrim City, Yonthan, Koksan, Sinphyong, Suan, Singye and Sangwon counties rationally distributed labor forces and machine means to suit each field and area and completely wound up the sowing in planned areas by dovetailing the relations between the processes of the work.
					
					 Cooperative farms in Yonsan, Sungho and Junghwa counties sowed wheat and barley seeds for autumn in more regions than last year while keeping the scientific and technological demands in sowing seeds.

articles.title: Pheasants and Roe Deer Released in Mountains of North Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Pheasants and Roe Deer Released in Mountains of North Hwanghae Province
						
 Sariwon, October 8 (KCNA) -- The protection and propagation of animals are brisk in North Hwanghae Province.
					 More than 10 000 pheasants and hundreds of roe deer bred with much effort were released in mountains of various cities and counties of the province recently.
					
					 Officials and workers of Sariwon City, Songrim City, Yonthan County, etc. explored and tapped diverse fodder sources and made effective use of them and fully ensured such conditions as appropriate temperature for growth.
					
					 They significantly increased the breeding rate of those animals and nurtured lots of strong babies.
					
					 Other counties including Hwangju, Rinsan, Sohung and Sangwon are raising those animals to be robust by using up-to-date breeding and caring methods while procuring veterinary medicines by their own efforts.

articles.title: Rungna Pleasure Park Reinforced with New Facilities
articles.content:
Rungna Pleasure Park Reinforced with New Facilities
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Rungna People's Pleasure Park in the capital city of Pyongyang now boasts of 3-d rhythmic cinema and video games rooms, which were built fashionably nearly a month ago.
					 An increasing number of people are enjoying themselves over the new facilities, along with swimming pool, funfair and dolphinarium.
					
					 The 3-d rhythmic cinema, which breaks into five rooms, helps develop mentality among the viewers, making them join the virtual world.
					
					 The happy appearances of the people in this dream park foreshow the Korean people's prosperous life to come under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Vietnamese Gives Impression of Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Vietnamese Gives Impression of Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Hoang Anh Tuan, director general of the Institute for Foreign Policy and Strategic Studies of Vietnam, was interviewed by the Korean Central News Agency on Monday before leaving the country.
					 He said he visited several places during his stay which helped him know better about the reality in the DPRK. He went on:
					
					 The Korean people are working hard for the national prosperity despite difficulties.
					
					 I was deeply moved to see the rapid progress being made in the DPRK.
					
					 All these achievements are attributable to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people are advancing along the road of victory.
					
					 What I saw here are precious to me.
					
					 I am sure that the Koreans will make a further progress in the cause of building a thriving nation and achieving the national reunification.
					
					 I got deep impressions to visit the International Friendship Exhibition House.
					
					 Every gift there reflects the boundless reverence of the world people for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It was the first time for me to see such rare gifts.
					
					 Among them are gifts from the leaders and people of Vietnam.
					
					 The visit helped me to know the deep reverence of the world people for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I also visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to them who are deeply admired by all people for their exploits before the times and humankind.
					
					 I will make positive efforts to develop the bilateral friendship provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and the strategic cooperation between Vietnam and the DPRK over the East Asian regional issues.

articles.title: Premier Soccer Matches Under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Soccer Matches Under Way in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Premier soccer matches for the DPRK Championships are going on in Pyongyang.
					 On Sunday, the Kigwancha Team lost to the Myohyangsan Team 1:2 in the men's event, which was beyond expectation of football experts and fans.
					
					 The match held between the Ministry of Light Industry Team and the Mangyongbong Team in the men's event ended with no goal.
					
					 The Rimyongsu Team defeated the Wolmido Team 3:0 and the Ponghwasan Team won the Amnokgang Team 2:1 in the women's events.
					
					 On Monday, the Amnokgang Team edged out the Rimyongsu Team 1:0 and the Pyongyang Team the Wolmido Team 1:0 in men's events.
					
					　In the women's events, the April 25 Team beat the Hwangryongsan Team 3:0 and the Kalmaegi Team drew with Mangyongbong Team at 0:0.

articles.title: National Sports Contest of Provincial Teams Goes on
articles.content:
National Sports Contest of Provincial Teams Goes on
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The National Sports Contest of Provincial Teams goes on at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, drawing bigger attention of sports fans and other people.
					 There were group league matches of ssirum, Korean wrestling, and semifinals of basketball, volleyball, table-tennis and tug of war on Sunday and Monday.
					
					 The spectators enthusiastically cheered the players.
					
					 The ssirum team matches brought together more than 90 players who were selected from each province.
					
					 Diverse techniques displayed by the players aroused applauses from spectators.
					
					 High scores were registered by teams of North Phyongan, South Hamgyong and South and North Hwanghae provinces in the league matches.
					
					 Taeryonggang and Chongchongang teams secured final berths in the men's basketball event in the provincial sports division and South Phyongan Province and Nampho City teams in the women's volleyball event, Kangwon Province and Nampho City teams in the table-tennis event and North Phyongan Province and Jagang Province teams in the tug of war event in the mass sports division.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Defeats Brunei Rival 6:0
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Defeats Brunei Rival 6:0
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The league matches of Group H are underway in Bangkok for berth to the 2014 Asian U-19 Football Championship.
					 The DPRK, Brunei, Singapore and Thailand will play matches from October 8 to 12. 
					
					 The match between the DPRK and Brunei teams took place on Tuesday where the DPRK team defeated Brunei rival 6:0.
					
					 The DPRK team will hold the second match with the Singapore team on October 10.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Chinese Team 1:0
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Chinese Team 1:0
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The women's football matches took place between the DPRK team and Chinese team at the 6th East Asian Games on Monday. 
					 The matches brought together teams of the DPRK, China, Japan and Taipei of China. They will hold league matches to decide standings. 
					
					 The DPRK team defeated its Chinese rival 1:0.
					
					 It will have the second match with China's Taipei team on Wednesday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Kim Jong Il's Idea and Exploits in Party Building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Kim Jong Il's Idea and Exploits in Party Building
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an editorial to the anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The editorial says the election of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK on Oct. 8, Juche 86 (1997) marked a historical event of great significance in the accomplishment of the cause of building a Juche-oriented party and a thriving nation.
					
					 His energetic leadership over the party building ushered in a new era of modeling the entire party and the whole society on Kimilsungism and strengthened the organizing ability and the might of unity of the party to the maximum, it notes.
					
					 Praising his undying exploits for party-building, the editorial calls for upholding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK and holding fast to his idea and exploits for the party-building.
					
					 The editorial says:
					
					 His idea and exploits for the party-building are not only the eternal treasure but the invincible banner for the WPK and the Korean revolution. They are the precious guidelines to which the WPK should hold fast constantly and implementing them is the sure guarantee for strengthening the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the party building and activities should be carried out with great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as guidelines. Kim Jong Il's idea and exploits for party building should be firmly defended and all the problems arising in party building and activities should be settled the way he did.
					
					 The WPK should be developed into Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the great leader of the WPK and he represents the victorious banner of the Korean revolution. The dignity of the WPK is precisely the absolute prestige of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The invincibility of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party lies in developing the party into the guiding force loyal to Kim Jong Un's idea and leadership.
					
					 The editorial appeals to all people to work hard for the final victory of the great Paektusan power, united close around Kim Jong Un as befitting the descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime for Issuing "White Paper on Human Rights Record in North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime for Issuing "White Paper on Human Rights Record in North"
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime recently issued "the 2013 white paper on human rights record in the north", a document to slander the DPRK.
					 It put together false information collected from such suborned scum as traitors to the nation and fugitives who committed all sorts of crimes so as to work out the document.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes as follows:
					
					 This is a deliberate politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK to malignantly slander its dignity and social system and push the north-south relations into the worst catastrophe under the pretext of "human rights".
					
					 The smear campaign of slinging mud at the DPRK over its "human rights issue" will only cause the escalation of distrust and confrontation with the DPRK and the outbreak of war as it is the product of criminal and unpardonable intention to attain the ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 Such human rights racket being conducted by the puppet regime is plunging the inter-Korean ties, already in a serious situation, into a complete deadlock. Herein lie the severity and traitorous nature of the racket.
					
					 Such a racket is another extremely vicious provocation against the DPRK, equivalent to the joint military maneuvers against it.
					
					 The national reconciliation and unity and the peace and independent reunification of the country can never be realized if such a racket is tolerated.
					
					 It is the mettle and revolutionary spirit of the DPRK to show no mercy to anyone who makes even the slightest mockery of the country's dignity and social system.
					
					 Those who go reckless to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, groundlessly taking issue with it over its "human rights", will never be able to go scot-free.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Misleading Public Opinion
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Misleading Public Opinion 
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of Unification, the "Saenuri Party" and other riff-raffs of south Korea bitterly criticized the statement issued by the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK. They talked such rubbish as an "unreasonable behavior bereft of basic courtesy" and "abusive words". They went so ridiculous as to talk about "polite demeanor" and "spirit of mutual respect". Conservative media of south Korea echo the invectives against the DPRK to incite hostility and make the public convince that the DPRK made wrong words. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group shamelessly talk about "courtesy" and "polite demeanor" while shelving the reckless remarks they have made so far. But these are what the DPRK should say to the south Korean puppet group. 
					
					 They have no face to talk about "unreasonable behavior bereft of basic courtesy" and "abusive words."
					
					 It is impossible to mend the north-south relations without correcting the reckless acts of the south Korean authorities as they analyze all things and phenomena conversely. 
					
					 They dared take fault with the DPRK's just warning for mending the north-south relations, a revelation that they have no intention to improve the relations. 
					
					 The north-south relations will end if the south Korean authorities persist in the confrontation with the fellow countrymen while desperately misleading the public opinion and not admitting their wrong behaviors. 
					
					 Then the group of Park Geun Hye will face the same condemnation by the nation as the Lee Myung Bak group met. 
					
					 The Park's group should face up to the mindset of the people and stop at once coarse invectives inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war, before it becomes too late.

articles.title: S. Koreans Renew Pledge to Continue Candlelight Actions
articles.content:
S. Koreans Renew Pledge to Continue Candlelight Actions
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- At least 2 000 people of all social standings of south Korea held a candlelight rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on Saturday denouncing the puppet Intelligence Service's illegal acts. It was sponsored by the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation.
					 At the rally speakers denounced the IS for its interference in the election, saying that several months have passed by since the launch of candlelight actions for probing the truth about the case but an investigation has not yet been made properly.
					
					 They accused the authorities of offering an opportunity to the ruling party by raising only the issue of the minutes of the south-north summit, far from probing the truth.
					
					 This is aimed to conceal the truth about the illegal interference in the election, they said, holding that it is Park Geun Hye who is patronizing the IS.
					
					 We can never stop the candlelight actions for probing the truth about the case of the IS and punishing those responsible, they said, adding: We will rally more people for the actions.
					
					 They declared that they would wage an indefinite action for the resignation of the present chief executive and the dissolution of the IS.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held events on October 4, the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The participants in the event held in New York watched a video documenting the historic Pyongyang summit in October 2007.
					
					 Read out there was "The Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity". Also read out there was a resolution of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration which was released on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Speakers called for reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans by following the path indicated by the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
					
					 Representatives of organizations of Koreans in Los Angeles held a remembrance session and round-table talks.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Calls for Making All Efforts to Reunify Country
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Calls for Making All Efforts to Reunify Country
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- O In Dong, a Korean in the U.S., attended a meeting marking the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration held in Ryongsan, Seoul on Saturday and gave a lecture calling for waging a more dynamic movement for national reunification.
					 It is very natural for a nation to live together and it is an absolute requirement in the light of the nation's history, he said.
					
					 Reunification is becoming a more urgent issue as the Korean Peninsula was divided by foreign forces, he noted.
					
					 If the Korean nation strengthens cooperation and exchange between the north and the south and reunifies the country on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration, it will be able to make great development, he said.
					
					 Now the south side is fawning on the U.S. approaching the issue of the Korean Peninsula with a main emphasis on its own interests, it noted, charging that no other place in the world serves foreign forces so actively as south Korea does.
					
					 No one offers reunification to Koreans and it can be achieved only by their concerted efforts, he said, calling for making all efforts to reunify the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The October issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare carried a gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party."
					 The work, made public on January 3, Juche 81 (1992), indicates that it is a serious lesson drawn by humankind in building socialism that the cause of socialism will advance along the road of victory when the people steadily develop the driving force of the revolution with firm faith in socialism and guided by correct idea while maintaining the socialist principle and strengthening comradely unity and cooperation on the basis of independence under any circumstances, but it will suffer turns and twists and setback when they fail to do so.
					
					 It clarifies the idea that it is the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea on building socialism to thoroughly carry out the three revolutions --ideological, technological and cultural-- while steadily augmenting the people's government and enhancing its function and role, and its validity.

articles.title: Personages of Poland, Myanmar Praise WPK
articles.content:
Personages of Poland, Myanmar Praise WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Personages of Poland and Myanmar released statements on October 1 and 2 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Juzef Lachut, member of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee, said:
					
					 The heroic Korean people built the genuine socialist system centered on the popular masses and reliably defended the sovereignty of the country despite the ceaseless aggression moves by the U.S. imperialists under the seasoned leadership of the WPK founded and led by President Kim Il Sung, thus recording a brilliant page in the history of the world revolutionary movement. 
					
					 The DPRK is shining as a beacon of hope of the progressive mankind.
					
					 It made a great contribution to defending the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the region under the Songun revolutionary guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The progressive forces of Poland strongly denounce all sorts of moves of the U.S. imperialists running amuck to secure a pretext of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, praised the immortal party-building exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, adding:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has further developed the WPK into an invincible guiding force true to the idea and cause of the Generalissimos.
					
					 I extend congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of October 10 and full support to the WPK and people of the DPRK in their just efforts for a final victory.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Democratic Congo and the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association jointly issued a bulletin "68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" on October 1.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK", "Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK" and "First Secretary Kim Jong Un".
					
					 It said:
					
					 The WPK was founded by President Kim Il Sung on October 10, 1945.
					
					 It is a political general staff leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Korean people have achieved a great advance in the revolutionary struggle and construction and strikingly demonstrated its might as a political, ideological and military power in the international arena under the leadership of the WPK for the past 68 years.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, who perfectly impersonated the President's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, built the WPK into invincible ranks that have achieved a harmonious whole with the leader and the masses from the first days of his work at the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Today the WPK is making steady progress as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, another distinguished leader.
					
					 The leadership provided by Kim Jong Un serves as a driving force for miracles and innovations in all fields including politics, economy and military affairs.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious in the future, too, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by the Socialist Party of Benin, the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan and the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany on October 2 to celebrate the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said:
					
					 The WPK has not been affected by any sect and sectarian strife behind which lies the outstanding leadership ability of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made the party an organizational and ideological entity based on one centre and thinking and will.
					
					 He is the eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal honorary president of the Socialist Party of Benin.
					
					 Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, noted:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on October 10, 1945.
					
					 The WPK has successfully played its role as the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have dynamically hastened the building of an economic power, single-mindedly united around the WPK headed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany stressed that under the leadership of the WPK the Korean people have covered the road of proud victory overcoming all sorts of trials and difficulties and worked miracles of building a powerful country no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Benin and Germany.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Supported by Polish Organization
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Supported by Polish Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on October 2 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 Declaration.
					 The statement said that the October 4 Declaration, which serves as a signal landmark in the struggle for independently realizing Korea's reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself," was adopted thanks to the ardent love for the nation possessed by leader Kim Jong Il out of patriotism.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The declaration gave great delight to all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak regime totally denied the October 4 Declaration through confrontation, treachery and provocation.
					
					 The present south Korean fascist government turned aside from the nation's long-cherished desire and waged the large-scale military drills against the DPRK and cracked down the pro-reunification progressive forces.
					
					 The DPRK is making sincere efforts for peace, reconciliation and reunification despite the continued provocations by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 This showed the DPRK government's ardent compatriotism and love for the nation.
					
					 We send full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their endeavors to implement the October 4 Declaration.
					
					 We express the belief that the atmosphere of peace, reconciliation and cooperation will further mount on the Korean Peninsula in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Instituto Central de Hongos nuevamente construido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Instituto Central de Hongos nuevamente construido
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el Instituto Central de Hongos de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, nuevamente construido, cuya area arquitectonica es mas de 6 mil 100 metros cuadrados.
					El Instituto compuesto por el edificio, la sala de cultivo de hongos para la investigacion, el almacen de materias primas y otros es una base de investigacion de hongos levantada segun la  noble voluntad del Mariscal de abrir la nueva historia de la industrializacion de cultivo de hongos.
					
					Al pasar revista a la sala de presentacion del historial, las salas de estudio, los laboratorios, la biblioteca electronica, la sala de conservacion de productos, el campo de cultivo y otros lugares del instituto, se cercioro en detalles del estado de construccion y la  investigacion.
					
					Subrayo que fueron construidos de modo tipico tanto las salas de investigacion, los laboratorios y el campo de cultivo de hongos como las oficinas, el pasillo exterior que conecta el edificio principal con el anexo, el vestibulo, el lugar de descanso y otros.
					
					Destaco que es muy importante el deber y el papel del instituto en la materializacion estricta del legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il de convertir nuestro pais en el de hongos.
					
					Senalo que ahora, se aviva por doquier del pais la oleada de produccion de hongos en acato al llamamiento del partido y estan irguiendose las fabricas de hongos con gran capacidad y las bases de produccion y agrego que para realizar la industrializacion y cientifizacion de la produccion de hongos deben priorizar la investigacion cientifica.
					
					Se refirio a que el instituto debe investigar la tecnologia de cultivo de hongos comestibles y medicinales, profundizar las labores para solucionar  el asunto de materiales para el cultivo de setas adecuados a las caracteristicas regionales y producir y asegurar satisfactoriamente las cepas madres necesarias al cultivo.
					
					Al citar la necesidad de organizar bien la direccion cientifica y tecnica sobre las unidades que cultivan los hongos, subrayo que se debe asentar con mas firmeza la base de datos relacionados con la investigacion y el cultivo de setas e introducir activamente las tecnologias avanzadas y divulgarlas entre las unidades correspondientes.
					
					Continuo que los funcionarios y los investigadores del Instituto deben lograr muchos exitos en sus labores para convertirlo  en una base cientifica y de investigacion que beneficie al pueblo.
					
					Senalo que el mismo ordeno terminar hasta el dia de la fundacion del PTC la construccion del instituto y la cumplieron los militares que estan acostumbrados a ejecutar incondicional y cabalmente la orden del Comandante, y se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que esto es el caracter innato del ejercito revolucionario y se sentia digno por haber encargado ese deber al ejercito popular.
					
					Dijo que se sentia muy alegre al recorrer el instituto y se fotografio junto a los comandantes de la unidad participante en la construccion y los funcionarios del instituto.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Pak Thae Song y Hwang Pyong So, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, hizo una visita de orientacion a la Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario en que trabaja Kim Ik Chol y dio las tareas y medios detallados para modernizarla.
					Ante todo, dio vuelta por el monumento de instrucciones dadas sobre el terreno por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de los grandes Hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que el Presidente, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk visitaron el 30 de marzo de 1947 y en varias veces la fabrica, ocasiones en las cuales dieron instrucciones de producir gran cantidad de articulos de uso diario de buena calidad al organizar con esmero la gestion empresarial y recordo con gran emocion la trayectoria recorrida por la fabrica.
					
					Estando en varios talleres, la casa cultural y otros lugares, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de produccion, las caracteristicas tecnicas de los equipos y la vida cultural de los trabajadores.
					
					Tras reconocer el interior y exterior de la planta, la variedad y la calidad de los articulos, evaluo los hechos de la fabrica y senalo que vino aqui para convertirla en un modelo de las fabricas similares del siglo XXI.
					
					Para que nuestro pais se situe a la altura de la potencia economica y nuestro pueblo viva felizmente sin envidiar nada, es muy importante la produccion de los articulos de uso diario que satisfagan al pueblo una vida creadora, senalo.
					
					Instruyo que deben establecer la alta meta en la modernizacion de la fabrica conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo y agrego que se debe remodernizar por completo todos los edificios de produccion y las instalaciones culturales y servicio publico.
					
					Se refirio a que el mismo solucionara todos los problemas que se presenten en el equipamiento satisfactorio de las instalaciones sofisticadas necesarias a la modernizacion y otros.
					
					A los funcionarios que no contenian la emocion por la visita del Mariscal en el dia significativo, en que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue elegido como Secretario General del PTC, el Mariscal dijo que vamos a llamar la fabrica como "Fabrica 8 de Octubre" en el sentido de trabajar bien sin olvidar el deseo del Dirigente.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Ri Man Gon, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades, cuya obra de primera etapa quedo terminada.
					El Mariscal tuvo la iniciativa de construirla, fijo su solar y soluciono uno tras otro los problemas que se presentan en la construccion.
					
					Durante su visita al campo de construccion hecha el 20 de mayo pasado, definio la meta de primera etapa para edificar la estacion como digna base combinada de mejoramiento de variedad en que se reproducen las cabras y otros animales domesticos herbivoros de buena variedad.
					
					Los constructores militares libraron de dia y noche una campana para crear en mas de mil 500 hectareas de tierra una area herbazal de centenares hectareas y construir numerosos edificios y corrales combinados al aire libre. Asi que se acabo con exito la construccion de primera etapa y se inicio la cria de los animales domesticos de buena variedad, cambiando asi la fisonomia de la aldea montanosa.
					
					Luego de escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de ubicacion de la estacion y del plan de perspectiva, recorrio el instituto de mejoramiento de variedad, el edificio de administracion, la casa cultural, los corrales de reproduccion y las viviendas en construccion y averiguo como marcha la obra.
					
					Evaluo altamente el hecho de que los constructores militares hayan cumplido magnificamente durante 4 meses y pico la orden del Comandante Supremo de terminar la obra hasta el dia de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					Se puso muy contento diciendo que gracias a los esfuerzos de los constructores militares, se abrio la perspectiva que posibilita suministrar mas carne a los uniformados.
					
					Subrayando que los animales de esa estacion tienen gran eficiencia economica, destaco que el ejercito esta al frente de la materializacion del legado de los Generalisimos de producir la carne con hierbas.
					
					Para criar muchos animales domesticos es importante solucionar el problema de pienso, dijo y agrego que en la estacion se debe formar el herbazal natural y artificial y sembrar arboles.
					
					Enseno que la estacion debera cumplir la funcion y el papel vanguardias en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido, segun la cual la labor de intendencia es precisamente la batalla para defender el socialismo y agrego que por eso, a base de los exitos y las experiencias logrados, debe impulsar con ambicion y audacia la construccion de la estacion para convertir esta zona en una moderna estacion.
					
					Tras definir la meta de segunda etapa de la estacion, ilumino el rumbo y los metodos para realizarla.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Jang Jong Nam, ministro de la Fuerzas Armadas Populares y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Elogiados como heroes los cientificos coreanos
articles.content:
Elogiados como heroes los cientificos coreanos
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Un dia de abril del 100 (2011) de la Era Juche, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un visito una fabrica acompanando al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Durante el recorrido, el Mariscal se reunio con jefe de catedra de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek.
					
					Luego de escuchar sobre la introduccion de las tecnologias desarrolladas en la fabrica por el profesor, el Mariscal estrecho fuertemente su mano reconociendo sus esfuerzos.
					
					A la hora de filmacion de la foto de recuerdo, coloco al catedratico a su lado y en direccion hacia el Dirigente.
					
					Cada vez que los cientificos y tecnicos coreanos lograban exitos para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y el aumento del poderio nacional, el Mariscal los encomia como heroes y patriotas que contribuyen a la prosperidad de la patria y al avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del partido.
					
					Hoy en dia, estimulados por la confianza de su lider, los cientificos de la RPDC garantizan en lo cientifico-tecnico la construccion de potencia economica.

articles.title: EMG del EPC advierte a EE.UU. sobre la tragedia a causa de medios de ataque nuclear anti-RPDC
articles.content:
EMG del EPC advierte a EE.UU. sobre la tragedia a causa de medios de ataque nuclear anti-RPDC 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El vocero del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 7 la siguiente declaracion:
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, que se relajaba gracias a los esfuerzos pacientes de la RPDC, volvio a la senda de empeoramiento.
					
					Esta corriente de la situacion esta relacionada directamente con la sostenida campana de enfrentamiento militar contra la RPDC de los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Como ya informado, a la madrugada del 4 de octubre, arribo otra vez al puerto de Pusan la flotilla del portaaviones nuclear norteamericano George Washington, que habia participado en los ejercicios maritimos combinados realizados en secreto desde el 30 de septiembre en el Mar Este de Corea tomando a la RPDC como blanco.
					
					La flotilla esta compuesta por George Washington cargado de mas de 100 ojivas nucleares, muchos destructores con misiles teledirigidos, cruceros, submarinos, buques escoltas y otros.
					
					Se dice que ella se incorporara a la maniobra naval conjunta de ataque anti-RPDC que se repetira en el Mar Sur de Corea desde el 8 de octubre con la participacion de los colectivos de buques japoneses y surcoreanos.
					
					Ahora el imperialismo norteamericano anuncia sin escrupulos que los presentes ejercicios navales cuyo autor principal es la flotilla de portaaviones norteamericano son una ofensiva militar planificada para disuadir las posibles "provocaciones" de la RPDC por el estilo de prueba nuclear y lanzamiento de misiles y para inducirla al "cambio".
					
					Este dicho demuestra claramente que no pasan de ser una mentira las promesas de altas figuras de la administracion Obama, inclusive el secretario de Estado quien dijo hace poco que su pais no tiene la politica hostil a la RPDC ni la voluntad de atacarla.
					
					Todas esas acciones militares coinciden con la aprobacion de la llamada "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" entre el amo gringo y su lacayo surcoreano, la cual toma como premisa el ataque preventivo anti-RPDC. He aqui la peligrosidad del caso.
					
					Al respecto, las unidades de todos tipos de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo del EPC recibieron el 5 de octubre la indicacion urgente de que revisaran los planes operacionales ya firmados por la Comandancia Suprema y se mantuvieran en el estado de movilizacion para entrar inmediatamente en la operacion en cualquier momento observando con vigilancia cada paso de los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente que si sus medios de ataque nuclear, incluso el portaaviones de propulsion nuclear, entran con mas frecuencia y mas profundamente en el espacio aereo y zonas maritimas cercanos a la Peninsula Coreana, esto causara sin falta una tragedia imprevisible.
					
					En cualquier caso, EE.UU. debera responsabilizarse totalmente por la tragedia que puedan sufrir inesperadamente sus medios de ataque nuclear enviados a menudo.
					
					Al respecto, insistimos invariablemente en que EE.UU. tome la decision de actuar primero si la administracion estadounidense desea de veras la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y esta interesada en la paz y la seguridad de la region.
					
					Es que ese pais es el autor que ideo la politica hostil a la RPDC, causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y amenaza a cualquier hora a la segunda con armas nucleares.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener bien presente que nuestro ejercito y pueblo estan listos en todos los aspectos para salir al encuentro de cualesquier fuerzas hostiles del mundo frustrando con su gran poderio militar las peores provocaciones de esas ultimas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente ugandes
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, con motivo del 51o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas por los esfuerzos conjuntos, el remitente desea de todo corazon al mandatario y su pueblo mayores exitos en sus esfuerzos por la paz, el desarrollo y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun se reune con delegacion tailandesa
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun se reune con delegacion tailandesa
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, departio el dia 8 en un ambiente amistoso con la delegacion del Departamento Internacional del Desarrollo y la Cooperacion de Tailandia encabezada por el director general Piroon Laismit que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Rubricado plan de intercambio cultural Corea-China para nuevo ano
articles.content:
Rubricado plan de intercambio cultural Corea-China para nuevo ano 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo suscrito este martes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el plan de ejecucion de intercambio cultural para nuevo ano entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Popular China. 
					En la ceremonia de firmas participaron, por la parte coreana, el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Hwang Ho Nam y otros funcionarios, y por la china, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica en Corea.
					
					Hwang Ho Nam y Liu Hongcai firmaron el documento.
